entry.source: {F812}Female voice\0Oh ho... I see you've come this far{F801}with the flame intact.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Female voice\0Oh ho... I see you've come this far{F801}with the flame intact.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 A woman from the Ring of Gaea stands{F801}in your way...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 A woman from the Ring of Gaea stands{F801}in your way...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ring of Gaea woman\0{F87A,54}The main temple you're looking for is{F801}right in front of you.{F801}{F802}But if you want to pass... you must{F801}prove your strength to me.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ring of Gaea woman\0{F87A,54}The main temple you're looking for is{F801}right in front of you.{F801}{F802}But if you want to pass... you must{F801}prove your strength to me.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ring of Gaea woman\0{F87A,54}Then I will summon my strongest demon.{F801}Fight for your life...!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ring of Gaea woman\0{F87A,54}Then I will summon my strongest demon.{F801}Fight for your life...!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ring of Gaea woman\0{F87A,54}That makes four of you...{F801}{F802}Samurai from the Firmament... It seems{F801}you are a force to be reckoned with.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ring of Gaea woman\0{F87A,54}That makes four of you...{F801}{F802}Samurai from the Firmament... It seems{F801}you are a force to be reckoned with.{F801}
